name: DeadBase: DeadBasic
description:
DeadBase : DeadBasic pits a single player against an endless number procedurally generated underground catacomb levels.

2nd-Place winner of Clay.io's "Got Game?" competition.
All new desktop patch release.

Featuring:
- Online Highscores Leaderboard.
- 8 Different Weapons.
(Knife, Pistol, Grenades, Shotgun, SMG, Chainsaw, LMG, PhayzerGun)
- Simple Destructible Environment.
- Dynamic Shadows.
- Basic Customizable Controls.
- Patched 1024x768 Desktop Resolution.
